text: Did @realDonaldTrump just say “chloroquine is a powerful old drug” that won’t “kill anyone?” #G6PDdeficiency If you harbor a #G6PD deficiency you can have acute #hemolysis & die from #Chloroquine https://t.co/ao0ZRMBuEF @CDCgov @US_FDA - stop #POTUS giving medical advice #COVID19 https://t.co/Y6D10jg1kq
